pageContext.claim: “What has been found during this period of time are the illegal acts of getting this whole phony investigation started. … It was an illegal investigation. It was started illegally. Everything about it was crooked -- every single thing about it. There were dirty cops. These were bad people.”
pageContext.analysis: Railing against special counsel Robert Mueller's investigation, Trump claims it "was started illegally." It was a Trump appointee, Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein, who authorized the investigation and selected Mueller to lead it. Multiple judges have upheld Mueller's appointment. The incendiary charge that the investigation was "crooked" or handled by "dirty cops" is not supported by the facts.
